name: StandardizedAssessmentToolsForFatigueRelatedToChronicIllness
title: Standardized Assessment Tools for Fatigue Related to Chronic Illness
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set captures concepts related to assessment tools used to classify fatigue in patients with chronic illnesses.),(Data Element Scope: Standardized assessment tools.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes the PROMIS and FACIT tools.),(Exclusion Criteria: PROMIS and FACIT tools that do not assess fatigue related to chronic illness are excluded.)

contains.display: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue Questionnaire - version 4 (FACIT-F)
Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue Questionnaire -13 items - version 4 (FACIT - fatigue 13)
